page.title: 06SUPERNATURAL
page.content: There are many legends of ghosts, but only a few have been seen in recent years. A cleaner at Ashlyns Hall has seen the ghosts of an old man, once in the basement, and once sitting, in what is at present an upstairs office. Legend also has it that a ghostlt lady walks across the balcony at the front of Ashlyns Hall. A security guard was patroling the outside of the house, when suddenly his dog stood with his hair on end, and refused to walk past the balcony. Several people were walking near Grove Farm, when a lady in white floated across thier path, then disappeared. In a meadow in Two Dell's Lane one midsummers evening, a man in grey was seen to step up the bank, then disappear.
